ATTITUDE Oceanly Phyto-Age Night Cream

Brand: ATTITUDE

Category: Anti Aging

Ingredients: Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed wax, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, jojoba esters, glycerin, oenothera biennis (evening primrose) oil, oleyl lactate, argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil, undecane, caprylic/capric triglycerides, tridecane, dicaprylyl ether, aqua/water/eau, olus oil, myrica cerifera (bayberry) fruit wax, behenyl

oil, oleyl lactate, argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil, undecane, caprylic/capric triglycerides, tridecane, dicaprylyl ether, aqua/water/eau, olus oil, myrica cerifera (bayberry) fruit wax, behenyl behenate, zea mays (corn) starch, polyhydroxystearic acid, sucrose laurate, sucrose stearate, acacia decurrens flower wax, polyglycerin-3, euphorbia

oil, myrica cerifera (bayberry) fruit wax, behenyl behenate, zea mays (corn) starch, polyhydroxystearic acid, sucrose laurate, sucrose stearate, acacia decurrens flower wax, polyglycerin-3, euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax, glycogen, hydrolyzed soy protein, nasturtium officinale (watercress) extract, rice amino acids, rosmarinus officinalis

decurrens flower wax, polyglycerin-3, euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax, glycogen, hydrolyzed soy protein, nasturtium officinale (watercress) extract, rice amino acids, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, caprylhydroxamic acid, glyceryl caprylate, hydrolyzed adansonia digitata (baobab) seed extract, proline
Warnings: Store at a temperature below 90 F. Avoid contact of the packaging with water. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.
